H0.text: In the Old Testament book of Judges, who is the son of Manoah. Gideon

H1.text: In the Old Testament book of Judges, who is the son of Manoah. Ibzan

H2.text: In the Old Testament book of Judges, who is the son of Manoah. Jephthah

H3.text: In the Old Testament book of Judges, who is the son of Manoah. Samson

A4.text: In due time, their son Samson is born.

A5.text: The Angel of the Lord appears to Manoah's wife and proclaims that the couple would soon have a son who would begin to deliver the Israelites from the Philistines.
